info.author: Christian Bierschneider
info.description:
## Maps the [sofascore](https://www.sofascore.com/de/) rating to [comunio](https://www.comunio.de/home) players [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/bierschi/ComunioScore.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/bierschi/ComunioScore) [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-green.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) - get live points from your comunio players - website to visualize rating, points and different statistics from your comunio players - messenger integration to share it in groups chat with friends ## Installation install package from source with 

sudo python3 setup.py install
## Usage edit the `comunioscore.ini` file with credentials for comunio and postgres database: 

[comunio]
username=
password=

[database]
host=
port=
username=
password=
dbname=

[comunioscore]
schema=comunioscore
table_auth=auth
table_communityuser=communityuser
table_squad=squad
table_season=season

[telegram]
token=
execute the console script 

ComunioScoreApp
or start the systemd service file 

sudo systemctl start ComunioScoreApp.service
## Deployment on server create a wheel for server deployment 

sudo python3 setup.py bdist_wheel
install wheel with 

pip3 install ComunioScore-1.0.0-py3-none-any.whl
uninstall wheel with 

pip3 uninstall ComunioScore
## Troubleshooting add your current user to group `syslog`, this allows the application to create a folder in `/var/log`. Replace `` with your current user 

sudo adduser <user> syslog
to apply this change, log out and log in again and check with the command `groups` ## Changelog All changes and versioning information can be found in the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/bierschi/ComunioScore/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst) ## License Copyright (c) 2019 Bierschneider Christian. See [LICENSE](https://github.com/bierschi/ComunioScore/blob/master/LICENSE) for details
info.name: ComunioScore
info.summary: Maps the sofascore rating to comunio players
